quote: Life is meaningless and there’s nothing we can do about it.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: The only absolute knowledge attainable by man is that life is meaningless.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If we do not find meaning in life, we will find it in death.
author: Albert Camus

quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Man is the only animal that can remain on friendly terms with the victim he intends to eat until he eats him.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: The absurd is the essential concept and the first truth.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I can give you no reason for loving life, only a reason to hate death.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: Life is a constant struggle against the absurdity of existence.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
author: Aristotle

quote: The only purpose of life is to exist in spite of its meaninglessness.
author: Albert Camus

quote: All is vanity, and striving after the wind.
author: King Solomon

quote: The search for meaning is an act of defiance against the void.
author: Irvin D. Yalom

quote: The meaning of life is that it stops.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: The human condition is such that, in the end, we’re all left to face the absurd alone.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Nothingness is more profound than existence.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: We are the slaves of our own nihilism.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Life is nothing, but the attempt to escape from the void is everything.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: There is no meaning to life except the meaning we give to it.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: The universe is indifferent to human suffering.
author: Thomas Ligotti

quote: The absurd is born of this confrontation between the human need and the unreasonable silence of the world.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Life is a dream, and the dream is the only thing that matters.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: The universe doesn't care about you.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Suffering is universal; the way it is dealt with is not.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Life is a pointless joke, and we are all the punchline.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: The only reason we exist is because we were born into this meaningless world.
author: Thomas Ligotti

quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: We are born into a world where we do not belong, and we will die in the same way.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: The world is full of suffering, but it is also full of the overcoming of it.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Death is the ultimate rebellion.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: What does not kill me makes me weaker.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: What is the meaning of life? To be awake and conscious and then to let it go.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: We are just a moment in time.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Life is a mistake that does not stop happening.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: Life is absurd. It’s a joke played on us by the universe.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Humans are the only species who can create a sense of purpose out of an empty universe.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I wish I could be content, but I’m not. Life is too big for my comprehension.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: In a world without meaning, the only meaning is the one you create.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The meaning of life is the lie that we keep telling ourselves.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: We are all doomed, and there is no escape.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: The absurdity of life is its greatest irony.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Suffering is the one thing that guarantees meaning in a meaningless universe.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: We are born into a world of suffering and go to our graves without ever having truly understood it.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The universe is a chaos, and human life is but a fleeting moment of order.
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote: All of life is nothing but an illusion. A flicker in the darkness.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Our existence is a pitiful waste of time.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: We make meaning to escape from the void that stares back at us.
author: Thomas Ligotti

quote: Life is an absurdity, one in which we can never find true peace.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The search for meaning is futile, but it is the only thing we can do.
author: Albert Camus

quote: We are all just dust in the wind, and nothing else matters.
author: Kansas

quote: All things must pass, even the greatest of human achievements.
author: George Harrison

quote: The greatest of human suffering is that we cannot escape our own absurdity.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Meaning is a lie we tell ourselves to make life bearable.
author: Albert Camus

quote: What is life but a series of meaningless events?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: We are a species that thrives on finding meaning in a world that is fundamentally indifferent.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Life is a cosmic joke; we are its punchline.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: We must imagine Sisyphus happy.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The absurd man is he who lives without hope in a hopeless world.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Reality is nothing but a cruel joke played by the universe.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Meaningless is the human condition.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: We live in a world where the most important things are, in the end, the least important.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: In the end, we find no reason for our suffering, only the suffering itself.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: It is the lack of meaning that gives life its meaning.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: We are insignificant in the grand scheme of things.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: The universe is indifferent to human struggle and suffering.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Life is just a temporary illusion on a dark stage.
author: Thomas Ligotti

quote: There’s no grand purpose behind it all; it’s just a series of random events.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: The meaning of life is simply that it has none.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Everything is absurd, and so it must be embraced.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: We are born to suffer, and in the end, we die alone.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Life is a journey without a destination.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: In the end, everything will be forgotten.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: We are all just passing through an endless void.
author: Thomas Ligotti

quote: Life’s meaning is something we must construct for ourselves, but it will never be enough.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The universe will continue on, indifferent to our suffering.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Life is absurd because meaning itself is absurd.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: We are like ants in a grand cosmos, fighting for meaning where none exists.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: In the end, the only real truth is that there is no truth.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Meaning is nothing more than an illusion designed to make life more bearable.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The universe is dark and full of suffering, but life goes on.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Life’s absurdity can only be acknowledged by those brave enough to face it.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Everything we do is in vain, yet we continue to do it.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The greatest act of rebellion is to live in a meaningless world.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: There is no true purpose, only endless cycles of suffering.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre
